name: Proto Golden Wing
description:
A game made in a week for the Kaijujam 2

You will take command of the Kaiju fighter known as Golden Wing, a superheroine who soars through the sky with golden wings and blasts evil with a big a** gun. Today she's been called to action to fend off a demon invasion headed by an ugly mofo, codenamed "The Ram", who is, uh, just a head but with legs. Kind of small for a Kaiju but a threat nonetheless. Be ready to dodge lots of bullets.

__________________________________________________________________________________________

The proto in the title is short for prototype because I ended up doing a lot less than I planned.  The ram was only meant to be the introductory kaiju which is why it isn't much of a kaiju. But while animating it I remembered how much I hate animating, so I cut the game down to this single fight and submitted it early just to get this project out of the way.

Controls:

W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys to move

Left Click or Space for basic fire

Right Click or LAlt for alt-fire

Middle Mouse or P Key to pause

Esc to exit to the main menu

Sound Credits:

Main Menu Music by Gigakoops: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/gigakoops/

Game Level Music by AKMV-18: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/akmv-18/

Tutorial Level Music by Eric Matyas: https://soundimage.org/

Most Sound Effects from Zapsplat: https://www.zapsplat.com/

Other Sounds made with Chiptone: https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
